fields.name: ApplicationConsistentSnapshotFrequencyInHours
fields.description: The interval (in hours) at which Hyper-V Replica should create an application consistent snapshot within the VM.

fields.name: OnlineReplicationStartTime
fields.description: The scheduled start time for the initial replication. If this parameter is Null, the initial replication starts immediately.

fields.name: RecoveryPointHistoryDuration
fields.description: The duration (in hours) to which point the recovery history needs to be maintained.

fields.name: StorageAccounts
fields.description: The list of storage accounts to which the VMs in the primary cloud can replicate to.
